avg_cpu_util: avg_over_time ((sum by (instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="${instance}", job="${job}", mode!="idle"}[${duration}])) / on (instance) group_left sum by (instance) ((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[${duration}]))))[${duration}:${queryRes}]) * 100
avg_memory_util: avg_over_time(((node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance="${instance}", job="${job}"} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{instance="${instance}", job="${job}"} - (node_memory_Cached_bytes{instance="${instance}", job="${job}"} + node_memory_Buffers_bytes{instance="${instance}", job="${job}"} + node_memory_SReclaimable_bytes{instance="${instance}", job="${job}"})) / node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance="${instance}", job="${job}"})[${duration}:${queryRes}]) * 100
avg_network_mbps: avg_over_time((sum by (instance) (irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{instance="${instance}", job="${job}", device!~"(docker|lo).*"}[${duration}]) + irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{instance="${instance}", job="${job}", device!~"(docker|lo).*"}[${duration}])) * 8)[${duration}:${queryRes}]) / 1000^2
host_info: node_os_info{instance="${instance}", job="${job}"} or node_uname_info{instance="${instance}", job="${job}"} or node_cpu_info{instance="${instance}", job="${job}"}
max_cpu_util: max_over_time ((sum by (instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="${instance}", job="${job}", mode!="idle"}[${duration}])) / on (instance) group_left sum by (instance) ((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[${duration}]))))[${duration}:${queryRes}]) * 100
max_memory_util: max_over_time(((node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance="${instance}", job="${job}"} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{instance="${instance}", job="${job}"} - (node_memory_Cached_bytes{instance="${instance}", job="${job}"} + node_memory_Buffers_bytes{instance="${instance}", job="${job}"} + node_memory_SReclaimable_bytes{instance="${instance}", job="${job}"})) / node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance="${instance}", job="${job}"})[${duration}:${queryRes}]) * 100
max_network_mbps: max_over_time((sum by (instance) (irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{instance="${instance}", job="${job}", device!~"(docker|lo).*"}[${duration}]) + irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{instance="${instance}", job="${job}", device!~"(docker|lo).*"}[${duration}])) * 8)[${duration}:${queryRes}]) / 1000^2
